info.name: Job Search - Authentication API
info.description:
Postman collection for testing Job Search Authentication API endpoints

Database Schema:
- users table: user_id (UUID), name, gender (VARCHAR(10)), date_of_birth (DATE), phone (VARCHAR(15)), address (TEXT), avatar_url (TEXT)
- Required fields: email, password
- Optional fields: name, role, gender, date_of_birth, phone, address, avatar_url

item.name: Authentication

body.raw:
{
    "email": "jobseeker@test.com",
    "password": "Test123!@#",
    "name": "Nguyễn Văn A",
    "role": "job_seeker",
    "gender": "Male",
    "date_of_birth": "1995-05-15",
    "phone": "0123456789",
    "address": "123 Đường ABC, Quận 1, TP.HCM",
    "avatar_url": "https://example.com/avatar.jpg"
}

request.description:
Register a new job seeker account.

Required fields:
- email: User email address
- password: Must be at least 8 chars, include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special char

Optional fields (all fields except email/password are optional):
- name: Full name
- role: 'job_seeker' (default) or 'employer'
- gender: 'Male', 'Female', or 'Other' (VARCHAR(10))
- date_of_birth: Format 'YYYY-MM-DD'
- phone: Phone number (VARCHAR(15))
- address: Full address (TEXT)
- avatar_url: URL to avatar image (TEXT)

Note: You can remove any optional fields from the request body - they will be ignored.

body.raw:
{
    "email": "employer@test.com",
    "password": "Test123!@#",
    "name": "Lê Văn C",
    "role": "employer",
    "gender": "Male",
    "date_of_birth": "1985-03-20",
    "phone": "0987654321",
    "address": "456 Đường XYZ, Quận 2, TP.HCM",
    "avatar_url": "https://example.com/employer-avatar.jpg"
}

request.description:
Register a new employer account.

Required fields:
- email: User email address
- password: Must be at least 8 chars, include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special char
- role: 'employer'

Optional fields:
- name: Full name
- gender: 'Male', 'Female', or 'Other' (VARCHAR(10))
- date_of_birth: Format 'YYYY-MM-DD'
- phone: Phone number (VARCHAR(15))
- address: Full address (TEXT)
- avatar_url: URL to avatar image (TEXT)

Note: After registration, employer needs to be linked to a company in the employer table separately.
Login with email and password. Returns access token and refresh token.
Logout user. Requires authentication (Bearer token). Client should delete tokens after logout.
Refresh access token using refresh token. Returns new access token and refresh token pair.

Request password reset. Generates a 6-digit token and sends it via email.

This endpoint:
1. Validates email exists
2. Generates a random 6-digit reset token
3. Sends the token via email (in redirect URL)
4. Returns the token in the response

Response includes:
- token: Random 6-digit reset token (e.g., 123456) - also sent via email
- email: User email

Note: Token is included in the email reset link as a query parameter.

Reset password with email and new password.

This endpoint:
1. Validates the new password
2. Updates the user's password
3. Generates a random 6-digit reset token
4. Sends the token via email
5. Returns the token in the response

Required fields:
- email: User email address
- newPassword: New password (must meet requirements)

Password requirements:
- At least 8 characters
- Include uppercase letter
- Include lowercase letter
- Include number
- Include special character

Response includes:
- token: Random 6-digit reset token (e.g., 123456) - also sent via email
- email: User email
Verify email address with token from verification email.
Resend email verification to user.
Callback endpoint for social login (Google, Facebook). Processes OAuth callback from Supabase.

item.description: All authentication endpoints for Job Search API

request.description: Get current user profile. Requires authentication.
Update user profile. Requires authentication.
Upload user avatar. Requires authentication. Use form-data with 'avatar' field.
Delete user avatar. Requires authentication.
Get user activity statistics (applications, saved jobs, saved searches). Requires authentication.
Save a job. Requires authentication.
Get all saved jobs for current user. Requires authentication.
Get count of saved jobs. Requires authentication.
Check if a job is saved. Requires authentication.
Unsave a job. Requires authentication.
Save a job search. Requires authentication.
Get all saved searches for current user. Requires authentication.
Get count of saved searches. Requires authentication.
Delete a saved search. Requires authentication.
Get jobs list with pagination and filters. Public endpoint.
Get job details by ID. Public endpoint.
Get all jobs posted by authenticated employer. Requires employer role.

body.raw:
{
    "job_title": "Senior Developer",
    "job_description": "We are looking for...",
    "requirements": "5+ years experience",
    "salary_min": 20000000,
    "salary_max": 30000000,
    "location": "Ho Chi Minh City",
    "job_type": "full_time"
}

request.description: Create a new job posting. Requires employer role.
Update a job posting. Requires employer role.
Delete a job posting. Requires employer role.
Publish a job. Requires employer role.
Expire/close a job. Requires employer role.
Increment job view counter. Public endpoint, no authentication required.
Get all applications for a specific job. Requires employer role.
Get all resumes for authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get resume by ID. Requires authentication.
Create a new resume. Requires authentication.
Update a resume. Requires authentication.
Delete a resume. Requires authentication.
Upload CV PDF file for a resume. Requires authentication. Use form-data with 'cv' field.
Download CV PDF file. Requires authentication.
Delete CV PDF file. Requires authentication.
Submit a job application. Requires job_seeker role.
Get all applications for authenticated user. Requires job_seeker role.
Get application statistics for authenticated user. Requires job_seeker role.
Get application details by ID. Requires job_seeker role.
Update an application (cover letter, resume). Requires job_seeker role.
Withdraw an application. Requires job_seeker role.
Update application status (pending, reviewing, accepted, rejected). Requires employer role.
Add notes to an application. Requires employer role.
Get current employer profile. Requires authentication.
Update employer profile. Requires authentication.
Get public employer profile by ID. No authentication required.
Get all jobs posted by an employer. No authentication required.
Upload employer avatar. Requires authentication. Use form-data with 'avatar' field.
Delete employer avatar. Requires authentication.
Get all applications for employer's jobs. Requires employer role.
Get all companies. Public endpoint.
Get company details by ID. Public endpoint.
Create a new company. Requires authentication (admin).
Update company. Requires authentication (employer/admin).
Delete company. Requires authentication (admin).
Get all jobs from a company. Public endpoint.
Upload company logo. Requires authentication (employer). Use form-data with 'logo' field.
Upload company banner. Requires authentication (employer). Use form-data with 'banner' field.
Delete company logo. Requires authentication (employer).
Delete company banner. Requires authentication (employer).
Get all users with pagination. Requires admin role.
Block or unblock a user. Requires admin role. Status: 'active' or 'blocked'.
Get all employers with pagination. Requires admin role.
Verify an employer. Requires admin role.
Get all companies with pagination. Requires admin role.
Get all jobs with pagination. Requires admin role.
Delete a job (for violations). Requires admin role.
Get overview statistics. Requires admin role.
